com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary

Class DialogAlert

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary.DialogTwoButtonFragment
        • com.chdryra.android.mygenerallibrary.DialogAlert
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DialogDeleteConfirmFragment 

    public abstract class DialogAlert
extends DialogTwoButtonFragment
    Simple abstract class for building alert dialogs, for example user confirmation requests etc. Need to override getAlertString() to specify the question to the user. Default button actions are "Yes" and "No".
